# outputDuration

**Instance Property**

The output duration of the sample buffer.

## Declaration

```swift
var outputDuration: CMTime { get }
```

## Discussion

This is the duration of decoded, trimmed and stretched samples. It is calculated as: `(Duration - TrimDurationAtStart - TrimDurationAtEnd) / SpeedMultiplier`.

- Duration is `duration` property of this sample buffer.
- TrimDurationAtStart is the value of [doc://com.apple.coremedia/documentation/CoreMedia/CMSampleBuffer/AttachmentKey/trimDurationAtStart] attachment (default 0).
- TrimDurationAtEnd is the value of [doc://com.apple.coremedia/documentation/CoreMedia/CMSampleBuffer/AttachmentKey/trimDurationAtEnd] attachment (default 0).
- SpeedMultiplier is the value of [doc://com.apple.coremedia/documentation/CoreMedia/CMSampleBuffer/AttachmentKey/speedMultiplier] attachment (default 1).
title: outputDuration
